name: Volcarona
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona’s fire provided a replacement for the sun.

ancient_trait.name: θ  Stop
ancient_trait.effect: Prevent all effects of your opponent’s Pokémon’s Abilities done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Burning Scale
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Wind Wheel
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.
